text: @PrisonPlanet But...but...I was absolutely assured by the US & UK Media (who believe wholeheartedly in "science") that there was NO possibility that the Chinese were manipulating Coronavirus, and any suggestion that they were was simply a right-wing conspiracy theory! 🙄
